bibl.title: The Hellenistic World from Alexander to the Roman Conquest. A Selection of Ancient Sources in Translation. Second Augmented Edition.
bibl.note: 1st edition: 1981. - See in part. pp. 444-571: Chapter 7. The Ptolemies and Egypt [Nos 254-326]: 1. The Ptolemies in Egypt and the wider world; - 2. Aspects of Egypt under the Ptolemies.
AUSTIN Michel, The Hellenistic World from Alexander to the Roman Conquest. A Selection of Ancient Sources in Translation. Second Augmented Edition.
Cambridge, Cambridge University Press, 2006, 8°, xxxiv-625 pp., 7 cartes, 4 pll. ISBN 0-521-82860-4 (hbk) / 0-521-53561-8 (pbk). £60 (hbk) / 22.99 (pbk).
